I’ve had three for about two months and have only worn them for maybe two weeks (scattered days combined roughly) one cherry broke off and I’m not sure how I’m supposed to put it back on. I lived the look but very disappointed with the quality
The cherries haven’t broken like I’ve read in other reviews or products, the chains are a nice weight and it fits perfectly as a necklace.
the necklace itself is of decent quality but one of the cherries fell off literally as i opened the bag for the first time :[

I absolutely loved this necklace when I got it a few months ago. It has a good weight to it, it fits well, and it's super cute. I have only worn it maybe 10 times since I bought it at the end of February and it has fallen apart unfortunately. First the bar for the clasp fell off, but I could still wear it using one of the rings for a connector. Then just yesterday one of the cherries fell off! I don't do anything crazy active when I wear it, I go out and eat or shop so i was very shocked and disappointed as I really felt that the quality of this item was higher. The chain itself is very nice, but the cherries are fragile, I don't think i would purchase it again unfortunately.
I’ve seen this necklace in Urban Outfitters for way more, so this one is a good deal. I’ve worn it for 2 months and it’s not tarnishing but I do avoid getting it wet.
I wore it ONE day and the cherry broke off! I thought, it’s fine I’ll just wear it as a chain. Wore it one more day and the clasp broke. 😀

I disliked how bendable the cherry stems are. They make me think they are gonna break off If they get accidentally tugged on to hard. They haven't yet. The neclace chain itself is pretty sturdy and hasn't rusted at all. Though that may chainge in the future. I wear it just about everywhere and enjoy it quite a bit :) have had no problems so far! I recommend it. It's worth the money
its beautiful but unfortunately its too heavy.  Some might be ok with it being a little weighted as most costume jewelry is.
I honestly expected cheaper materials given the price, but this necklace feels great. The plastic cherries don't feel cheap at all and it looks good on. 10/10

I love it, it’s so cute. I pretty much use it with every outfit, it’s become a staple. The chain is pretty heavy, the cherry charm is pretty sturdy and made out of hard plastic. It’s a pretty good purchase if you ask me!
